thread.title: Nexus 6 and Nexus 9 Won’t Get 7.1.2 Update, But Will Still See Security Patches
thread.title_full: Nexus 6 and Nexus 9 Won’t Get 7.1.2 Update, But Will Still See Security Patches

author: Kellex
title: Nexus 6 and Nexus 9 Won’t Get 7.1.2 Update, But Will Still See Security Patches
text:
This is ridiculous. Forced obsolescence at its best. Tyler Durden 
“But we buy nexus for the updates” Eric R. 
It’s pretty sad now that other manufacturers are supporting their devices longer than Google is. The N6 is more than capable of running these updates and future ones I’m sure. About Droid Life 
We consider ourselves to have the greatest Android community in the world, here at Droid Life . We talk general news, feature apps, review phones, and even teach you how to hack a little. But most importantly, there is no place on the internet that has the reader participation that we do and consider ourselves to be completely community driven. If you were looking for the best place to learn about Android and talk with like-minded folks about all things tech, then Droid Life is for you. Follow Us
